1307510.name: The Innsmouth Case Demo
1307510.description:
Welcome to Innsmouth!


Become part of a stirring story, where every decision you make has a lasting effect. Immerse yourself into the craziness of the first 3 chapters of The Innsmouth Case. A scary-comedy-text-adventure inspired by the fantastical works of horror legend H.P. Lovecraft.

What has the full version to offer?


  • 35 chapters full of comedy and craziness
  • even more - awkward - conversations with 30 animated characters
  • Tentacles! Tentacles! Tentacles!
  • vast number of story interconnections
  • more than 160.000 words
  • ...and much more
